tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Employees ( employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_name VARCHAR(255), department VARCHAR(255), join_date DATE )
CREATE TABLE PerformanceReviews ( review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, employee_id INT, review_date DATE, rating INT, feedback TEXT )
CREATE TABLE Reports ( report_id INT PRIMARY KEY, report_date DATE, reviewer_id INT, reviewed_employee_id INT, comments TEXT )

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  first_name VARCHAR(50),
  last_name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  performance_score INT,
  review_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  review_id INT,
  feedback_type VARCHAR(50),
  feedback_notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (review_id) REFERENCES PerformanceReviews(review_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_name VARCHAR(100),
  report_date DATE,
  report_content TEXT,
  generated_by INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (generated_by) REFERENCES Employees(employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Employee (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  department VARCHAR(50),
  hire_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceReview (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  review_date DATE,
  performance_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  review_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT,
  feedback_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Report (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  review_id INT,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Department (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department_name VARCHAR(50)
)
